statements: UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET views = 100, likes = 50, dislikes = 5 WHERE video_id = 1;
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET dislikes = 2, likes = 60, views = 120 WHERE video_id = 2;
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, dislikes = 50, views = 500 WHERE video_id = 1;
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET dislikes = 20, views = 300, likes = 150 WHERE video_id = 2;
UPDATE VideoMetrics SET engagement_score = 80, views = 500 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ViewerMetrics SET total_watch_time = 2000, average_watch_time = 400, total_videos_watched = 10 WHERE viewer_id = 'a8b58759-745c-467d-b2aa-2a08d0d05f11';
UPDATE VideoMetrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE video_id = '1a7f7e92-cc6f-4b8f-acb7-6c7539261123';
UPDATE ViewerMetrics SET total_watch_time = 5000, average_watch_time = 1000, total_videos_watched = 10 WHERE viewer_id = '2b37c6b9-8039-4a2e-b136-feafc718c3bf';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET engagement_rate = 0.8 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE viewer_demographics SET region = 'Europe', age = 35 WHERE viewer_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET engagement_rate = 0.75 WHERE video_id = 'd4eaa5d8-8c09-4dc8-8b14-35f35ba0228c';
UPDATE viewer_demographics SET age = 35 WHERE region = 'Europe';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET engagement_time = '10 minutes' WHERE video_id = '1a67a8b4-2ce2-4b7e-a6bc-feda56965514';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET playback_count = 50, viewer_id = '3c8d56ad-ca2a-44b1-8b6e-42da3c9c2a81' WHERE video_id = '4598fd13-51e8-483d-9d4a-6e94fd524679';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET engagement_time = '02:30:00', playback_count = 100 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET viewer_id = '98765432-1234-abcd-5678-abcdef123456', engagement_time = '01:45:00', playback_count = 75 WHERE video_id = 'abcdef12-1234-5678-9012-abcdefabcdef'
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET likes = 150 WHERE video_id = 'c843f9fb-e3aa-4db8-9217-c8f041b98b76';
UPDATE video_metadata SET description = 'Updated description', duration = 3600, upload_date = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE video_id = 'a7e9f4e5-bd50-4830-a1cb-7d2ce17992b2';
UPDATE video_engagement_metrics SET views = views + 100, likes = likes + 20, comments = comments + 5 WHERE video_id = 'cd67bf48-01bc-4b67-845e-2ea4025a38be';
UPDATE video_users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '7cc0d93e-99ba-4d39-85d6-09d75e7d9492';
